title: Indiabulls HF seeks review of SC order on ED's powers
description: Indiabulls Housing Finance has requested a review of the Supreme Court's February order, which allegedly expanded the Enforcement Directorate's powers beyond the PMLA law's mandate and conflicted with the Vijay Madanlal Choudhary vs Un-ion of India case. The company argues that the decision violates the fundamental rights of accused individuals and has far-reaching consequences on all pending criminal trials in India.
